title: What It Means When Someone Texts You an Apple Emoji

steps.title: Apples are their favorite food.
steps.content: Apples are their favorite food. If you see someone adding a 🍎 to their social media captions, chances are they like apples. Maybe they’ve posted a picture of their favorite apple dessert or them apple picking. Either way, a 🍎 or multiple 🍎s could be a show of affection for their favorite fruit. [1] X Research source “Is there anything better than an apple cobbler?🍎” “I love all things 🍎😋”

steps.title: The fall season is approaching.
steps.content: The fall season is approaching. Leaves are changing colors, and apples are hanging from the trees. An 🍎 could symbolize the changing of seasons. Check the context of the text or caption. Are they talking about autumn? Do they pair the apple emoji with other fall-like emojis? [2] X Research source “Fall is here!🍎🍂🎃” “I can’t wait for apple picking season🍎”

steps.title: It’s time to go back to school.
steps.content: It’s time to go back to school. Apples are a common symbol for teachers. Students leave apples on their teacher’s desk to show their appreciation. An 🍎 alludes to this tradition when talking about the back-to-school season. Schools and universities often put this emoji in their back-to-school social media announcements. “The school year is just around the corner, and we can’t wait to see you again🍎🏫✏️” “Ready for school?🍎”

steps.title: They’ve started eating healthier.
steps.content: They’ve started eating healthier. A 🍎 could represent a diet. Ever heard the phrase “An apple a day keeps the doctor away?” When talking about health, an apple emoji alludes to this saying. Maybe they’re texting you about their healthy lifestyle, or they’ve posted a picture of a balanced snack. [3] X Research source “I’m trying to eat healthier again🍎🥦” “I love my new favorite snack!🍎”

steps.title: They like you.
steps.content: They like you. Instead of using a ❤️, they may use a 🍎. This is a cute and unique way to show love and affection. If your partner sends you a single 🍎, it could be them saying, “I love you.” “You’re the best🍎” “I love you to the moon and back🍎”

steps.title: It represents the Apple company.
steps.content: It represents the Apple company. Steve Jobs has turned this famous fruit into a brand of its own. If someone uses a 🍎 when talking about technology, they’re most likely referring to Apple. “Got a new computer today🍎🖥️” “Loyal 🍎 user right here.”

steps.title: It symbolizes New York City.
steps.content: It symbolizes New York City. The Big Apple can be summed up with a 🍎. You may see someone using the apple emoji when traveling to the big city. Maybe they’ve posted a picture of them standing under a skyscraper or holding a giant slice of pizza. [4] X Research source “🍎 here I come!” “In the city that never sleeps🍎🚕”

steps.title: Snap a pic of your baking creation.
steps.content: Snap a pic of your baking creation. If you’ve made a yummy apple dessert or baked good, post a picture along with a caption featuring a 🍎. This will tell your followers that your treat has apples in it. [5] X Research source “Another day, another baked good🍎😋” “Best apple pie ever🍎”

steps.title: Post a fall selfie.
steps.content: Post a fall selfie. Keep things simple in your selfie caption by using an 🍎. Pose in an apple orchard, or snap a pic with your favorite fall beverage. “Feels like fall🍎” “Apple cider is perfect this time of year🍎😋”

steps.title: Tell your friends you’re off to school.
steps.content: Tell your friends you’re off to school. Use a 🍎 to symbolize the start of a new school year or semester. Add it to a caption or Tweet how you feel about the new year starting. “Can’t wait to get back in the classroom!🍎😄” “If I give my teach an 🍎, maybe she’ll go easy on me.”

steps.title: Talk about your healthy lifestyle.
steps.content: Talk about your healthy lifestyle. Tell your friends how hard you’re working on eating healthier by using the apple emoji. Add a 🍎 to your Snapchat or Instagram story featuring a healthy meal or you at the gym. “Can’t go wrong with this healthy combo🍎🥜” “An 🍎 a day keeps the doc away!”

steps.title: Tell someone you care about them.
steps.content: Tell someone you care about them. A ❤️ can be replaced with a 🍎. This is a quirky and light-hearted way to show someone some love without saying the L word. “I really like you🍎” “What would I do without you?🍎”

steps.title: When you buy a new Apple product.
steps.content: When you buy a new Apple product. Chances are you want to show your latest tech purchase off to the world. Snap a pic and add 🍎 to the caption, or text a friend what you got using only emojis. [6] X Research source “The latest model and I couldn’t be happier🍎” “🍎💻😆”

steps.title: Get excited about a trip to NYC.
steps.content: Get excited about a trip to NYC. The Big Apple is calling your name, and you can use 🍎 on all your vacation posts. Allude to where you’re headed on the plane with a single 🍎, and caption your pictures with emojis that scream New York. “✈️🍎😉” “Finally made it to the Big 🍎!”

steps.title: An apple emoji isn’t only used on its own.
steps.content: An apple emoji isn’t only used on its own. You can pair this fruit emoji with other emojis to make a secret message. Here are some common 🍎 emoji combinations: 🍎🏙🚕 = New York City 🍎🥧 = Apple pie ​🍎​🧃​ = Apple juice 🍎💪 = Working out 📱​🍎​ = Steve Jobs 👦​👩​🍎​🐍​ = Adam and Eve
